summary: Ever got tired of the Companions faces and hair? This is the mod for you.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]The Companions are fierce warriors, and they have allways been. Their story goes back to Ysgramor and the 500 companions. So, I wonder: [i]Did they allways look so bad?
[/i][/size]Yes, some of them can't sleep due to the Best Blood, but insomnia is no excuse!

[size=4][b]Features

[/b][/size][size=2]Changes the looks of all of the Companions, except for Vignar Gray-Mane and Eorlund, who by is words [/size][i]isn't a Companion.[/i][size=2] So included in this looks overhaul are seven Companions: Aela, Njada, Ria, Farkas, Vilkas, Athis and Torvar. [/size]
[size=3][u]May not look exactly like the pictures. I have Younger Faces for men [/u](frow Better Males and Smooth Male Body)[/size]
[b][size=4]
Minor Issues and Possible Bugs [/size][/b]

[list][*][size=3][u]Njada[/u]  may appear naked. [/size][/*]
[/list] [i][size=2]fix: [/size][/i][size=2]Use a Follower overhaul ( in my case UFO) and reset to default clothes (again in my case: [i]You are naked![/i]).[/size]
[list][*][size=3]If you done what's said in previous point, she may appear with her helmet on.[/size][/*]
[/list] ﻿ [i]fix: [/i][size=2]Take that helmet from her inventory.[/size]
[b][size=4]
Things I'm not sure if worked, need feedback[/size]
[list][*][size=2]I've tried to make Farkas use the Wolf Armor again. (during a quest, he turns into a werewolf, when he turns back, he now has a steel armor.) For me this didn't work, maybe it will work for you.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Changed Ria weapons from a shield and one-handed sword to two one-handed swords. Not sure if she will dual-wield.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=5]Required:[/size]
[list][*][size=3]Apachii's Sky Hair: Female and Male, (not sure if the Full package works with all the changed NPC's)[/size][/*]
[/list][left][size=5]No DLC's required!

Please Give Me Your Feedback!
[/size][/left][/b]
author: Henricp4
